name: Reincarnation Hell
description:
Reincarnation Hell is a turn-based battle game that combines dice and chess. 2022 GMTK  Game jam.

Theme : Roll of the Dice.

Things to know before playing!!!
  • You and your army got trapped in a hell-like place. Suddenly , a voice from the depth and a giant demon body shows up , He throw you few dice and want you to entertain him..."As a human ,use your tiny little brain to defeat me , with these dice "IT said.
  • Use the dice to move the chess to attack. 
  • Use the dice to move the chess to attack, and count the number of your step to avoid the attack.
  • Used pieces are suspended for two turns and cannot be used.

The image below shows the Attack Multipliers for the dice.

How to play?
  • Use your mouse to click on the pieces on the board!
  • And select dice to move and attack!
